summary: An ordinance amending section 18 of Ordinance No. 19853, entitled: "An ordinance creating and defining the positions of the officers and employees in different departments of the city government of the City of Seattle, limiting the salaries thereof, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith", approved December 31, 1908, as amended by Ordinance No. 20876, entitled: "An ordinance amending Section 18 of Ordinance No. 19853, entitled: 'An ordinance creating and defining the positions of the officers and employees in different departments of the city government of the City of Seattle, limiting the salaries thereof, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith' approved December 31, 1908" approved May 7, 1909.
